name: Zombies Town (Malik_Dev)
description:
As John, the last surviving soldier in a zombie-infested military camp, your mission is to retrieve the VokiToki device from Room 13 on the second floor. With the device, a helicopter will be waiting on the school building rooftop for extraction. But the camp is crawling with zombies, and you'll need to fight your way through, using ammo packs and health packs to survive. Time is ticking as you race to the rooftop, and when you reach it, the helicopter pilot is ready. Get on board and hold on tight as the helicopter takes off, leaving the camp behind. Your mission is complete, but the battle against the zombie menace continues.

 Good luck, John!
